member.name: ITrayDeskBand.DeskBandRegistrationChanged
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITrayDeskBand.HideDeskBand
member.param: A reference to a deskband CLSID.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITrayDeskBand.IsDeskBandShown
member.summary: Indicates whether a deskband is shown.
member.param: A reference to a deskband CLSID.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the deskband is shown, S_FALSE if the deskband is not shown, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: ITrayDeskBand.ShowDeskBand
member.param: A reference to a deskband CLSID.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITrayDeskBand
member.summary: Exposes methods that show, hide, and query deskbands.
